alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Forsyth (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 8:46PM EDT until May 16 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR FORSYTH AND NORTHEASTERN DAVIDSON COUNTIES... At 846 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kernersville, or 7 miles east of Winston-Salem, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Winston-Salem, Thomasville, Kernersville, Clemmons, Bermuda Run, Huntsville, Lewisville, Walkertown, Rural Hall and Pfafftown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
